content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill at position(-46.5, 70.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when researching a technology that is already researched
- Ensure the technology is not already researched before attempting to research it.

### Errors when crafting an item with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when placing an entity at a position occupied by another entity
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity. Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
